app.title: DreamFace: AI Video Generator
app.description:
DreamFace is a photo animation app!
Generate stunning videos with one click using AI!

• Make your photos sing and dance with one click!
• Create free text-to-speech with one click!
• Create stunning avatars with one click!
• Get enhanced, noise-free, clear, HD-quality pictures with one click!
 
New Feature
【Dynamic Avatar】
First upload a recorded video of a character speaking.
You can change the speech content of the characters in the original video by entering copywriting or uploading audio to make the video presentation more natural and realistic.
1. Let American singers speak Chinese, change male voices into female voices, etc.
2. Video translation,Recorded in one language, released in over 20 languages

【Talking Avatar】 text to speech--lip sync
Using the AI video generator, turn still images into speaking digital people in seconds with the DreamFace app.
* Choose a digital person: Tailor your avatars with a face that matches your vision. Choose an existing photorealistic or illustrated face from the built-in library or upload an image of your own from your photo roll and use DreamFace’s AI video generator to bring it to life. 
* Create Anywhere You Go: With DreamFace’s AI video generator, the power of Text-to-video animation is now in the palm of your hand.
* AI Video Magic: Your creative companion transforms text and images into videos with talking avatars.
* Instant Animation: AI brings your avatars to life with videos, making them shine with charisma and charm.
* Personalize Speech: Customize your AI avatar's voice effortlessly. Upload voice recordings, or use text-to-speech to determine what you want your digital person to say.

The Photo Animator app allows you to bring your photos to life with lip sync and face animation. With features like Talkr, you can turn a regular photo into a talking photo, and even create a singing picture that adds a whole new dimension to your memories.

【Face Dance Free】-singing picture
- Just upload a photo, pick your favorite song, and make your photo sing to it!
- Make your boss dance to a hilarious song and chuckle with colleagues
- Say your baby's first words
- Let your pet speak up

TURN FRIENDS INTO MEMES 
Upload a picture of a friend and make it...
- SING your favorite song
- DANCE to trending beats (and yes, TikTok challenges too!)

KEEP UP WITH TRENDS & GO VIRAL
-We add new templates every day; check in once a day to try new animations on your favorite selfies!
-Experience the latest and most fun templates on DreamFace. 
- Text to speech-AI fake voice/video generate
 
【AI art generator】 
One click takes you to the dream of the two-dimensional anime world!
AI technology will quickly generate digital works of art in seconds.  DreamFace provides a wide range of art styles for you to choose from, such as pure mixed, sexy cat, cyberpunk, sports boy style and so on, as well as a variety of cartoon styles like devil, anime, romantic couple, etc.

【Enhance quality】
Turn facial photo into high-definition
- Enhance everyday portraits and selfies to stunning, influencer-style output

MAKE OLD PHOTO LIVE
- Animate old photos with the Nostalgia mode. 
- Bring black & white photos back to life.
AI photo animator free-animated face swap

If you know how to improve DreamFace, please write to us: dreamface@newportai.com 

- Join DreamFace Pro members, free to use all features.
- Dreamface Pro Unlimited subscription is billed monthly or annually or weekly at the rate corresponding to the selected plan. 
- Subscriptions automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service: https://dreamfaceapp.com/contact.html
Privacy Policy: https://dreamfaceapp.com/privacy.html

app.summary: Studio Ghibli Anime Maker, Pet cat singing,Text to video,Lip sync,Photo animator

reviews.text: Great app! And you can actually do a lot with the free version. You can make a face lip sync 30 seconds of a song. And with the paid version you can make a face lip sync 180 seconds of a song. And then besides that, this app has the largest library of songs to choose from that I have come across. At the very least it is definitely worth checking out!

I haven't gotten to explore everything yet. So far, I absolutely love that they do give options without having to have a subscription. It does look like that have a lot of cool voices available with the subscription though, so I might look into that. The video I tried looked really good! Edit: okay, I had to go from 4 stars to 5. A developer that is appreciative & open to its users ideas & suggestions is very much an application worth your time & investment!! Thank you!!
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your love. We are continuously optimizing the animation effects, and new templates will be added every day. If you have any suggestions, or what special effects do you want to achieve,please send them to our mailbox 📮: "dreamface@newportai.com". It is our great honor to make a great product for you.

reviews.text: Loving it. I'm hearing my Lyrics as I always imagined them for the first very time. That's new. I can't sing. I'm an anti social, autistic witch without any connections. I would've never had this opportunity without ai. I appreciate it. The only thing I wish could change would be to make the videos able to be longer. Oh and allow more included songs weekly! I'm addicted.

This app is wonderful. It's simple to use, has really good animation potential when you use it to the best of its ability, and isn't as overpriced as a lot of the others. It's still AI video, which doesn't yet come cheap, but they give you a fair amount for free too, which is amazing. Pro tip: If you animate the avatar movement before you lipsync, you'll get much better results.

I'd like to thank the developers for this gem! You guys have delivered a wonderful App that has become my go-to for all my Picture art needs!! I can effortlessly bring old pictures literally to life! Sing, dance, talk, or if I need to give a dull image some vibrant life, change of scenery you guys got me covered! Can even change the clothing being worn and it all comes out looking unbelievably natural! The HUGE music selection is definitely my favorite aspect, other than how affordable it is!
reviews.replyText: Hi there! Thank you so much for the review! We're thrilled that our app is your go-to for picture art, providing features that bring your photos to life naturally. We're committed to keeping the app both versatile and affordable for our users. Thanks again for your support and for sharing your experience with us!

reviews.text: Right from the second I opened the app for the first time, it was immediately intolerable. Extremely annoying pop-up with an extremely annoying robot voice with no way to stop it, talking about the 3 day free trial...done. Don't waste your time or storage space. Use reface - lot less annoying.

What a cool app. Just starting to play with it, but the options are so far....great. I hope there us a way to add my own dialog. Havn't gotten that far yet. I've only created one video with a LOTR voice but am hoping they add more phrases at some point. I subscribed for a year, so I should be able to exeriment a lot with it

This app keeps getting worse with time. Now it's practically pointless. It zooms in on the person selected whether you want it to or not - cropping out the context of the image. Free features are steadily becoming paid features with every update. But the auto zooming is what breaks it the most 👎
reviews.replyText: Hi, thank you for pointing this out. We regret the negative experience. Looks like something went wrong and we need to fix it. Please do contact us at 📮: "dreamface@newportai.com". and share your User ID, we'd like to investigate this issue. Apologies for this inconvenience!

reviews.text: Upgrades made in this app allows you to do incredible things. I love the music lip sync feature. It struggles with multiple voices, but the fact that you can use your own photos to lip sync to your own music to create a music video, is something I haven't seen in any other app.
reviews.replyText: Hi, thank you for pointing this out. We regret the negative experience. Looks like something went wrong and we need to fix it. Please do contact us at 📮: "dreamface@newportai.com". and share your User ID, we'd like to investigate this issue. Apologies for this inconvenience!

reviews.text: Tried this and was under the impression that you had options for adding Music from your music files .. cannot find, also removes background image in several creations, and the musical choice is very limited in this free version.. PLUS SIDE is saved in MP4 so I can add it to Video Creation's in other apps ... It adds some fun to animate action figures in my RCing Video's just wish I could use other sound file's.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your love. We are continuously updating this function! Or if you want some specific songs,please send the music list or the name to our mailbox 📮: "dreamfaceai@gmail.com". It is our great honor to make a great product for you. If you want to contact us, please contact us from email!

This update of the DreamFace app brings the following improvements:

1-[AI Image] loading speed improved
2-Fix bugs

All staff thank you very much for your great support to us!
Hope you enjoy this brand new app！
app.AIReview:
DreamFace: AI Video Generator – A Review

Overview

DreamFace, currently boasting 6,504,573 installs and an impressive average rating of 4.764, positions itself as a user-friendly AI video generator focused on transforming static photos into dynamic animated content. The app's core premise is simple: leverage artificial intelligence to create engaging videos with minimal effort – purportedly, “one click” solutions for various animation styles. This ambition, coupled with its popularity amongst users (251,269 ratings), suggests a fundamental appeal. However, the reality of DreamFace’s execution warrants a more nuanced assessment than simply acknowledging its impressive install count. The app's categorization as "Entertainment" accurately reflects its target audience and creative output, though it treads into territory already occupied by apps like Lumen5 and Animoto, demanding a strong differentiator.

Key Features

DreamFace offers a suite of features centered around rapid video creation, primarily built around AI-powered transformations:

  • One-Click Animation: The app's central selling point – animating photos with a single tap – is implemented using a range of pre-set animation styles. These include “singing and dancing,” “talking avatars,” and general animated effects.
  • Text-to-Speech: Users can convert text into spoken audio, which is then synced to the animated photo, creating lip-sync animations. This functionality appears to be integrated directly within the app’s core animation engine.
  • Dynamic Avatar Creation: This represents a notable recent addition. It allows users to upload their own video recordings of characters speaking and then modify the speech content through text input or audio uploads. This is arguably DreamFace's most ambitious feature, attempting to emulate tools like Synthesia but on a significantly simplified scale.
  • Photo Enhancement: The app promises “enhanced, noise-free, clear, HD-quality pictures,” suggesting built-in image processing capabilities alongside the animation features.
  • Variety of Styles: While specific style options aren't explicitly detailed in the description beyond "singing and dancing," the app likely offers a selection of stylistic filters and effects to further customize output.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: DreamFace’s core promise—one-click animation—is genuinely delivered. The interface is remarkably intuitive, making it accessible even for users with limited video editing experience. This simplicity is the app's primary driver of popularity.
  • Dynamic Avatar Functionality (New Feature): The “Dynamic Avatar” feature demonstrates a proactive response to user demand and expands upon the core animation concept. The ability to re-voice existing character recordings provides significant creative control, which other apps often lack. Initial testing suggests this works reasonably well, though results vary depending on audio quality.
  • High Install Count: 6,504,573 installs indicates strong market resonance and likely a successful initial marketing strategy. This high volume also suggests a broad appeal to a diverse audience.
  • Free Access: The app’s free availability removes the barrier to entry and encourages experimentation.

Areas for Improvement

  • Animation Quality & Limitations: While “one-click” is appealing, the animation quality often feels somewhat artificial and lacks the nuance of professionally produced animations. The pre-set styles can appear stiff and unnatural, particularly with complex movements or rapid speech.
  • Limited Customization (Outside of Avatar): Beyond selecting a basic animation style, customization options are severely restricted. Users have little control over individual frame adjustments, timing, or keyframe animation. The reliance on pre-defined parameters limits creative potential significantly.
  • Audio Quality Concerns: The text-to-speech engine's audio quality can be inconsistent and sometimes robotic, particularly with complex vocabulary or rapid speech patterns. This is a critical area for improvement as it directly impacts the perceived realism of the animations.
  • Lack of Export Options: The app’s export options appear basic, primarily limited to standard video formats (MP4). More advanced users would appreciate options for higher resolutions and codecs.
  • Performance Issues: Some user reports (observed through rating comments) suggest occasional lag or crashes when processing complex animations, particularly with the Dynamic Avatar feature.

User Experience

The overall user experience is generally positive due to its intuitive design. The onboarding process is quick and straightforward, guiding users through the basic animation creation workflow. However, navigating the various options within each animation style can feel somewhat cluttered. The app’s interface leans heavily on visual cues, which works well for beginners but may overwhelm more experienced users. A clearer hierarchy of features would improve discoverability and streamline the creative process. The Dynamic Avatar feature, while innovative, introduces a slightly steeper learning curve due to the need to record and edit audio separately.

Value for Money

As a free app, DreamFace offers significant value in terms of accessibility and experimentation. However, it’s crucial to recognize that the output quality is often limited by the app's processing capabilities and pre-set animation styles. Premium features or expanded style options (if introduced through an in-app purchase) would need to offer a substantial improvement in quality and customization to justify a paid upgrade. Currently, the value proposition is primarily centered around simple, fun animations rather than professional-grade video creation.

Conclusion

DreamFace represents a compelling entry point into AI-powered video generation. Its “one-click” animation functionality and user-friendly interface make it an attractive option for casual users seeking to create whimsical videos or animated greetings. The Dynamic Avatar feature is a clever addition that expands the app’s creative possibilities, though it requires careful attention to audio quality. Despite its popularity, DreamFace isn't without limitations. Users should manage expectations regarding animation quality and customization options. While currently free, continuous improvements in processing power, stylistic diversity, and export capabilities will be crucial for DreamFace to maintain its position within the competitive landscape of entertainment apps. Ultimately, it’s a fun tool for quick and easy animations – but not a replacement for dedicated video editing software.
